name: Olivia Halva
description:
Do you need an NPC who lives in the forest and prepares healing salves? What about a hedge witch? Olivia is a mouse adventurer drawn for the Mausritter Mondays 2020

Part of the Mausritter: November of NPCs jam: https://itch.io/jam/mausritter-november-of-npcs

"Olivia Halva" is an independent production by @ellohir and is not affiliated with Losing Games. It is published under the Mausritter Third Party Licence. Mausritter is copyright Losing Games.
